__Age and Income:__
- Young (18-39) mostly earn ≤ $50,000.
- Middle-aged (40-64) more likely to earn > $50,000.


__Education and Income:__
- Higher education correlates with higher income.
- Doctorate holders predominantly earn > $50,000.


__Gender and Income:__
- Males have a higher representation in > $50,000 earnings.
- Females predominantly earn ≤ $50,000.
